title: Issue 358
summary: Don't miss dotNetConf focus on MAUI  this week!

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #358 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities.

This week there is the very exciting .NET Conf: Focus on MAUI happening, so make sure you save the date and catchup on the recordings.

Enjoy the links and until next time, have a wonderful week!

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #358 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities.

This week there is the very exciting [ .NET Conf: Focus on MAUI](https://focus.dotnetconf.net/) happening, so make sure you save the date and catchup on the recordings.

Enjoy the links and until next time, have a wonderful week!

Kym

items.title: .NET Conf 2022: Call for Speakers/Papers
items.description:
.NET Conf is a free, three-day, virtual developer event that celebrates the major releases of the .NET development platform. It is co-organized by the .NET community and Microsoft, and sponsored by the .NET Foundation and our ecosystem partners. This year, .NET 7 launches at .NET Conf 2022. If you want to be a speaker then go ahead and register your interest.

.NET Conf 2022: Call for Speakers/Papers by NET Foundation
items.description_markdown:
.NET Conf is a free, three-day, virtual developer event that celebrates the major releases of the .NET development platform. It is co-organized by the .NET community and Microsoft, and sponsored by the .NET Foundation and our ecosystem partners. This year, .NET 7 launches at .NET Conf 2022. If you want to be a speaker then go ahead and register your interest.

[**.NET Conf 2022: Call for Speakers/Papers**](https://sessionize.com/dotnetconf) by [NET Foundation](https://dotnetfoundation.org/)

items.title: Local .NET MAUI events happening around the world!
items.description:

items.description_markdown:

items.title: DevExpress .NET MAUI Update
items.description:
DevExpress are happy to announce that they released our first official version of the DevExpress .NET MAUI Controls for mobile development (Android and iOS). They have a deal to allow you to try their MAUI components for free until the end of 2022.

.NET MAUI — Support for the Latest .NET 6 Updates & New Learning Materials by DevExpress
items.description_markdown:
DevExpress are happy to announce that they released our first official version of the DevExpress .NET MAUI Controls for mobile development (Android and iOS). They have  a deal to allow you to try their MAUI components for free until the end of 2022.

[**.NET MAUI — Support for the Latest .NET 6 Updates & New Learning Materials**](https://community.devexpress.com/blogs/mobile/archive/2022/08/02/devexpress-net-maui-support-for-the-latest-net-6-updates-and-new-learning-materials-v22-1.aspx) by [DevExpress](https://www.devexpress.com/)

items.title: Getting Started With Basic Bindings in .NET MAUI
items.description:
Bindings allow you to reflect data changes in your user interface. Let’s see how to bind data in .NET MAUI.

Getting Started With Basic Bindings in .NET MAUI by Leomaris Reyes
items.description_markdown:
Bindings allow you to reflect data changes in your user interface. Let’s see how to bind data in .NET MAUI.

items.title: Behaviors library for .NET MAUI
items.description:
Behaviours are a great way to extend controls. The idea is that they are attached to a control and listen for something to happen. When the something happens, it triggers one or more actions in response.

David wrote a library for these back in the Xamarin.Forms days and now he has migrated it over to MAUI.

Behaviors library for .NET MAUI by David Britch
items.description_markdown:
Behaviours are a great way to extend controls. The idea is that they are attached to a control and listen for something to happen. When the something happens, it triggers one or more actions in response. 

David wrote a library for these back in the Xamarin.Forms days and now he has migrated it over to MAUI.

[**Behaviors library for .NET MAUI**](https://www.davidbritch.com/2022/07/behaviors-library-for-net-maui.html) by [David Britch](https://twitter.com/britchdavid)

items.title: .NET MAUI and Animations
items.description:
In this video, Daniel will show how animations work in .NET MAUI. Daniel will also show touch gesture recognizers and how to use them together with animations.

.NET MAUI and Animations by Daniel Hindrikes
items.description_markdown:
In this video, Daniel will show how animations work in .NET MAUI. Daniel will also show touch gesture recognizers and how to use them together with animations.

[**.NET MAUI and Animations**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=80sinVHdCSQ) by [Daniel Hindrikes](https://twitter.com/hindrikes)

items.title: Using Conditional Attributes in MAUI
items.description:
What if you never had to conditionally compile your code with preprocessor directives again? What if you could simply add an attribute to any method and have it compiled in or out based on a specific condition? Well you can with the C# Conditional Attribute.

Using Conditional Attributes in MAUI by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
What if you never had to conditionally compile your code with preprocessor directives again? What if you could simply add an attribute to any method and have it compiled in or out based on a specific condition? Well you can with the C# Conditional Attribute.

[**Using Conditional Attributes in MAUI**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dmBqDcTOiOQ) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

items.title: Client-Side Logging in .NET MAUI with MetroLog.Maui
items.description:
Adding logging to your .NET MAUI application has never been easier with MetroLog.Maui! Enable the logging in your MauiProgram and you can start implementing those log statements which you can then send to in-memory or even text files. As a cherry on the cake we get the "Shake to display logs" functionality out of the box 🤯

Client-Side Logging in .NET MAUI with MetroLog.Maui by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Adding logging to your .NET MAUI application has never been easier with MetroLog.Maui! Enable the logging in your MauiProgram and you can start implementing those log statements which you can then send to in-memory or even text files. As a cherry on the cake we get the "Shake to display logs" functionality out of the box 🤯

[**Client-Side Logging in .NET MAUI with MetroLog.Maui**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WicmnH72kf0) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

items.title: Announcing .NET Community Toolkit 8.0! MVVM, Diagnostics, Performance, and more!
items.description:
It's the official launch of the new .NET Community Toolkit version 8.0! Including tons of new features such as MVVM source generators, diagnostics, performance helpers, and more!

Announcing .NET Community Toolkit 8.0! MVVM, Diagnostics, Performance, and more! by Sergio Pedri
items.description_markdown:
It's the official launch of the new .NET Community Toolkit version 8.0! Including tons of new features such as MVVM source generators, diagnostics, performance helpers, and more!

[**Announcing .NET Community Toolkit 8.0! MVVM, Diagnostics, Performance, and more!**](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/announcing-the-dotnet-community-toolkit-800/) by [Sergio Pedri](https://github.com/Sergio0694)

embedded_links.title: **Announcing .NET Community Toolkit 8.0! MVVM, Diagnostics, Performance, and more!**
